price: Ẹ̀yin tí ẹ gbàgbọ́ ní òdodo, ẹ rántí ìdẹ̀ra Allāhu lórí yín, nígbà tí àwọn ọmọ ogun (oníjọ) dé ba yín. A sì rán atẹ́gùn àti àwọn ọmọ ogun tí ẹ kò fójú rí sí wọn. Allāhu sì ni Olùríran nípa ohun tí ẹ̀ ń ṣe níṣẹ́.¹
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱذۡكُرُواْ نِعۡمَةَ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيۡكُمۡ إِذۡ جَآءَتۡكُمۡ جُنُودٞ فَأَرۡسَلۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ رِيحٗا وَجُنُودٗا لَّمۡ تَرَوۡهَاۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ بَصِيرًا
footnotes: 1. Ọmọ ogun oníjọ ni àwọn ọmọ ogun ìjọ mẹ́ta kan tó para pọ̀ lórí ìjọ ọmọ ogun Ànábì - kí ìkẹ́ àti ọlà Allāhu máa bá a - : ìjọ ọmọ ogun Ƙuraeṣi, ìjọ ọmọ ogun Gatfān àti ìjọ ọmọ ogun Yẹhudi tí wọ́n jẹ́ àwọn ọmọ Nadīr. Gbogbo àwọn ọmọ ogun wọ̀nyí ní àpapọ̀ ni à ń pè ní ’ahzāb “ọmọ ogun oníjọ”.

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū udh'kurū niʿ'mata al-lahi ʿalaykum idh jāatkum junūdun fa-arsalnā ʿalayhim rīḥan wajunūdan lam tarawhā wakāna al-lahu bimā taʿmalūna baṣīran
